body: How to find the rest of the story
Ash once again showing he´ s one of the best doujin makers period
The art is great, the story is a mess though.

The dude didn't cum in the main girl, that was just his delusion. I'm pretty sure he already penetrated Akane (the loli) when they had their match in the first chapter though. So technically he's already had sex but like its been forgotten about I'm pretty sure - as sexysaxman25 said.

The story is such a mess...the dude literally came balls deep in the main girl in the first release in front of everyone and they completely forgot about that in the second release and the author even admitted that he changed the story so that everyone knows the dude can't have sex instead of just the main girl. Normally it's pointless to complain about plot consistency in hentai but they keep calling him a virgin or barely a virgin when he's not.
Wait what? there's a loli there! didn't even notice, lmao.
